title: create_new_member
description: Test the API endpoint responsible for creating new club members to ensure it correctly registers a new member with valid data and handles invalid input appropriately.

title: query_members_by_status
description: Test the API endpoint that retrieves members filtered by their status to verify it returns accurate and complete data for different status values.

title: update_member_information
description: Test the API endpoint for updating member information to confirm that changes are saved correctly and invalid updates are handled properly.

title: delete_member
description: Test the API endpoint for deleting a member to ensure the member is removed from the system and that attempts to delete non-existent members are handled gracefully.
